definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

pinyin: qiang3 po4 xing4 xing4 xing2 wei2

sentences.english: And "sexsomnia" disorders are easily treated with medication, he added.
sentences.chinese: 申克还指出，性行为睡眠障碍用药物治疗很方便。

sentences.english: Bonobos have developed a set of ritualized socio-sexual behaviors that are specific to their species.
sentences.chinese: 倭黑猩猩已经形成了一套自己独特的社交性行为。

sentences.english: "And the majority were having premarital sex, over 50 percent, " says Rosenbaum.
sentences.chinese: 他们中的大多数，超过50%有过婚前性行为。

sentences.english: What a perfect representation of performative sex.
sentences.chinese: 这是性行为的完美阐释。

sentences.english: And can we learn anything about human sexual behaviour from all this?
sentences.chinese: 那么我们人类可否从这些动物的性行为中学到什么呢？

sentences.english: Sexology home thinks, this is the first phase of female need sexual behavior.
sentences.chinese: 性学家认为，这就是女性需要性行为的第一个阶段。

sentences.english: He pleaded guilty to the lesser charge of unlawful sexual intercourse.
sentences.chinese: 他曾就情节较轻的“非法性行为”一项指控认罪。

sentences.english: But no one knows why somepeople respond to these triggers with sexual behavior.
sentences.chinese: 但是，没人知道为什么有人以性行为来回应这些刺激。

sentences.english: And the heart health benefits of sex don't end there.
sentences.chinese: 性行为对心脏健康的好处并未就此结束。

sentences.english: This is a combination of nervous and autoerotic actions.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个紧张动作和自体性行为动作的结合。

sentences.english: When a dog is in defense drive, he is displaying aggressive behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 处于防御驱力下的犬只，将表现出进攻性行为。

sentences.english: This protects us from being severely hurt by uncontrolled sexual activity.
sentences.chinese: 这就是要保护我们避免受乱来性行为的严重伤害。
美宇航局禁止太空性行为。

sentences.english: A voice-over on the DVD describes the sex as 'exciting'.
sentences.chinese: DVD上的旁白描述性行为是一种“刺激”的行为。

sentences.english: They say the voice could give a warning sign of future sexual behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员说声音是一个人未来性行为的预警信号。

definition: to fall into bad company/to make acquaintances indiscriminately
to have sexual relations with sb/to have dealings with
human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
